title: How can a business hire employees?
details: With Keikkakaveri, the business can view agencies that also use Keikkakaveri. The business can send a request directly to the agency, in which the business can tell more about its wishes (number of employees, requirements, dates, details, etc.). The business can view the sent job requests on its own page (Job Requests).

title: Do the employees have the same responsibilities as the business?
details: No. The workers have their own responsibilities that apply to them.
